Text: Awesome, thanks. But I don't see New Mutants #5 or X Factor #49... any chance we'llg et those?
They had not been scanned as of the time of the upload.

Demonoid will be up again at some point in the near future. They lost a substantial amount of data and are awaiting specific support to get the site back up and running again, according to a 9/26/2009 update from the site.
